Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens

Source: R/op_db.R
get_onco_drugs.Rd

Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens

get_onco_drugs(
  drug_is_targeted = F,
  drug_is_approved = F,
  drug_target = NULL,
  drug_action_type = NULL,
  drug_indication_main = NULL,
  source_opentargets_only = F,
  drug_has_blackbox_warning = F,
  drug_approved_later_than = 1939,
  drug_minimum_phase_any_indication = 0,
  list_per_drug_synonym = F,
  output_resolution = "drug2target2indication",
  output_style = "extensive",
  is_alkylating_agent = F,
  is_angiogenesis_inhibitor = F,
  is_anthracycline = F,
  is_antimetabolite = F,
  is_ar_antagonist = F,
  is_bet_inhibitor = F,
  is_hedgehog_antagonist = F,
  is_hdac_inhibitor = F,
  is_hormone_therapy = F,
  is_immune_checkpoint_inhibitor = F,
  is_kinase_inhibitor = F,
  is_monoclonal_antibody = F,
  is_parp_inhibitor = F,
  is_platinum_compound = F,
  is_proteasome_inhibitor = F,
  is_topoisomerase_inhibitor = F,
  is_tubulin_inhibitor = F
)

Arguments

drug_is_targeted

logical indicating if resulting drug records should contain molecularly targeted drugs only
drug_is_approved

logical indicating if resulting drug records should contain approved drugs only
drug_target

character vector with drug targets (gene symbols) for drug records included in results
drug_action_type

character vector with drug action types to include in drug record list - possible values "INHIBITOR","AGONIST","MODULATOR","ANTAGONIST","BLOCKER","ACTIVATOR","BINDING AGENT","OPENER", "STABILISER","CROSS-LINKING AGENT",DISRUPTING AGENT","OTHER"
drug_indication_main

character vector with main tumor types for which drug(s) are indicated possible values "Adrenal Gland","Biliary Tract","Bladder/Urinary Tract","Bone","Breast","Cervix","CNS/Brain", "Colon/Rectum","Esophagus/Stomach","Eye","Head and Neck","Kidney","Liver","Lung","Lymphoid","Myeloid","Ovary/Fallopian Tube", "Pancreas","Penis","Peripheral Nervous System","Peritoneum","Pleura","Prostate","Skin","Soft Tissue","Testis","Thymus", "Thyroid","Uterus","Vulva/Vagina"
source_opentargets_only

logical indicating if resulting drug records should contain drug records from Open Targets Platform only
drug_has_blackbox_warning

logical indicating if resulting drug records should contain drugs with black box warnings only
drug_approved_later_than

only include records for drugs approved later than this date (year)
drug_minimum_phase_any_indication

only include drug records that are in a clinical phase (any indication) greater or equal than this phase
list_per_drug_synonym

list resulting drug records per drug synonym
output_resolution

output record resolution ('drug','drug2target','drug2target2indication')
output_style

comprehensiveness of drug records ('extensive' - all annotations, 'narrow' - main annotations)
is_alkylating_agent

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_angiogenesis_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_anthracycline

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_antimetabolite

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_ar_antagonist

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_bet_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_hedgehog_antagonist

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_hdac_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_hormone_therapy

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_immune_checkpoint_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_kinase_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_monoclonal_antibody

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_parp_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_platinum_compound

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_proteasome_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_topoisomerase_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
is_tubulin_inhibitor

logical indicating if only this drug class is wanted
